upload.title: Upload Your Photo
upload.subtitle: Get instant AI-powered skin analysis
upload.dragText: Drag and drop your image here, or click to select

interpretation.title: Skin Health Insights
interpretation.good: Your skin appears healthy with good tone consistency
interpretation.fair: Your skin shows a fair complexion with room for improvement
interpretation.needsCare: Consider consulting a dermatologist for personalized advice

errors.uploadFailed: Failed to upload image. Please try again.
errors.analysisFailed: Analysis failed. Please try with a different image.
errors.noFaceDetected: No face detected in the image. Please upload a clear photo with a visible face.
errors.invalidFormat: Invalid image format. Please use JPG, PNG, or WebP.
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Please use an image smaller than 10MB.
